intro: Tylecodon × fergusoniae, commonly known as the hybrid ice plant, is a succulent shrub native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, characterized by its fleshy leaves and vibrant flowers. The plant is known for its ability to store water in its thick, fleshy leaves, which help it survive in arid conditions. Its flowers, which range from white to pink, bloom in late summer and attract pollinators such as bees and butterflies. Tylecodon × fergusoniae is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance.
